ModMetaData.name: Zhul Tribe - The Curled Ones
ModMetaData.author: ZhulTribe Mod Team
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Zhul tribe - a cannibal-worshipping faction with elaborate moustache rituals. These olive-gray skinned humanoids sport flamboyant spiraling moustaches that signify their status and spiritual power. They practice sacred cannibalism, believing that consuming enemy flesh absorbs the strength of souls.
Features: - Custom alien race with unique appearance - Cannibal traits with special dietary requirements - Ritual feast mechanics and mood effects - Custom items including moustache oil and sacrificial daggers - Hostile tribal faction with unique behavior patterns - Rich lore and cultural depth
The Zhul believe they sprang from a cosmic moustache-shaped comet and maintain their elaborate facial hair through daily grooming rituals with scented oils made from jungle orchids.
